product_name: Bern Berkeley Bike Helmet - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Offering tough durability and protection for skating, biking and boarding, the Bern Berkeley women's bike helmet also boasts sleek style that stands out at the skate park or on the slopes. Lightweight PVC shell with seamless ZipMold(R) liquid foam technology provides high strength-to-weight-ratio. Integrated visor shields your eyes from sun and rain; visor flips up when not in use. Air channels pull air through front vents and allow air to exit through back vents. Bern Berkeley helmet meets ASTM F 2040 standard for snow and ski, and CPSC and EN 1078 for bike and skate. Closeout.
short_description: Offering tough durability and protection for skating, biking and boarding, the Bern Berkeley women's bike helmet also boasts sleek style that stands out at the skate park or on the slopes.
